questions.text: You are hungry and you need to do a lot today. You probably thinking of a tasty burger? but you want it to be healthy. Well, we have something for you? just let us know, if you want to know what we are talkin about.
questions.title: Intro Teaser

finalAnswers.text: Our best restaurant chain has introduced the new organic fresh burger. So much green, it feels like I'm eating a salad, but it's a burger, which is as healthy as a bull of salad. You can get it today, we are opening a map with all the near by restaurants. Come on over for a taste and healthy.
finalAnswers.title: AI Response if Interested

finalAnswers.text: The only reason you could've sad no is because you just ate, but i know next time you will visit our best restaurant chain to try the new organic fresh burger, yum!
finalAnswers.title: AI Response if Not Interested

finalAnswers.text: It seems that there is no one there. Let's try next time.
finalAnswers.title: AI Response if Silence

questions.text: I'm sorry I didn't get that. Let's try it again.
questions.title: AI Response if Not Understood

finalAnswers.text: I'm having trouble in understanding you right now. Let's try again next time.
finalAnswers.title: AI Response if Not Understood Again
